name: Dakin Sloss
body: I run [Tachyus](www.tachyus.com) and built [OpenGov](www.opengov.com), [Software Report](www.softwarereport.com) and [CACS](www.cacs.org). I also invest in early stage start-ups, study the intersection of physics and philosophy, ski, and play tennis.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
